text: The leader of the ancestral house of the clans of Merari was Zuriel, son of Abihail. They camped at the north side of the tabernacle.
Then they went to console David with food while it was still day. But David swore, “May God do thus to me, and more, if before the sun goes down I eat bread or anything else.”
Tobiah the Ammonite was beside him, and he said: “Whatever they are building—if a fox attacks it, it will breach their wall of stones!”
Lysias was to send an army against them to crush and destroy the power of Israel and the remnant of Jerusalem and efface their memory from the place.
After Heliodorus had offered a sacrifice to the Lord and made most solemn vows to the one who had spared his life, he bade Onias farewell, and returned with his soldiers to the king.
The wise will possess glory, but fools will bear shame.
Or denies justice to anyone in the very sight of the Most High,
When he calls them, they answer, “Here we are!” shining with joy for their Maker.
Do not take away your mercy from us, for the sake of Abraham, your beloved, Isaac your servant, and Israel your holy one,
[For] whoever does the will of God is my brother and sister and mother.”
the son of Serug, the son of Reu, the son of Peleg, the son of Eber, the son of Shelah,
The Father loves the Son and has given everything over to him.
